resources.string:
Hi! My name is Ella. 

I love cats. 

I have a cat back home. 
His name is Pig~~ 
Pig is a "Pusang Pinoy" with a shade of white and orange stripes. 
He has been with me since I was in Senior High. 

I have not been home for the longest time due to the pandemic. 
And that meant not seeing my cat :( 
I hope things will get back to normal soon. 
Because being far from the ones you love sucks.
